name: There is only one ambulance
description:
In this game you will control an ambulance that must deliver sick patients to the hospital before time runs out.

PS.: It's finally done!!! This is my first time in a jam. Sorry that it's another game about a Coronavirus related theme (Medical and Transport made me think about ambulances and it's imposible to not think about the virus in these times). 

PS.2: Sorry (again)  for the bad english, i'm argentinian.
